sentences.en: About 90 percent of the city's single-family homes are uninhabitable.
sentences.cn: 该市约90％的独户住宅都不适合居住。

sentences.en: As parts of the world become uninhabitable, millions of people will try to migrate to more hospitable areas.
sentences.cn: 随着世界的一些地方变得不适人居，数以百万计的人将会试图迁移到环境更加宜人的地区。

sentences.en: At that point, the Earth's atmosphere and water will be boiled away, leaving the planet uninhabitable.
sentences.cn: 此时, 地球的大气层和水也汽化的一干二净, 无法居住.

sentences.en: Each home has had to be inspected by an official to check that it is uninhabitable.
sentences.cn: 每间民房必须由官员调查以确定是否无法居住.

sentences.en: Earth has become uninhabitable and the surviving humans are fleeing to Mars.
sentences.cn: 地球已经变得无法居住,幸存的人纷纷逃离至火星.
有50处住宅已宣布不宜居住.

sentences.en: Growing ice shelves would make the shallows uninhabitable.
sentences.cn: 生长的冰架使浅水处变的不适宜动物居住.

sentences.en: In low - lying areas where entire neighborhoods were almost completely submerged, thousands of houses remain uninhabitable.
sentences.cn: 整个附近的低洼地区完全被淹没, 数以千计的房屋仍然不能居住.

sentences.en: In low - lying areas where neighborhoods were almost completely submerged, thousands of houses remain uninhabitable.
sentences.cn: 在地势较低的地区,周遍几乎全部被洪水淹没, 成千上万的房屋依然不适合用于居住.

sentences.en: Many houses were so badly damaged in the war that they were made permanently uninhabitable.
sentences.cn: 很多房屋在战争中严重受损，再也不能居住了。

sentences.en: Much of the country is uninhabitable because it is desert.
sentences.cn: 由于地处沙漠，这个国家的许多地区不适宜居住。

sentences.en: Superfund tried to clean it up, but eventually declared the town uninhabitable.
sentences.cn: 超级基金试图清理该地区, 但最终还是宣布该镇不宜居住.
这栋大楼根本没法住人。

sentences.en: The remaining 30 % of the planet is uninhabitable, a Tiberium wasteland swept by violent Ion Storms.
sentences.cn: 剩下的30%地表是无法居住的, 离子风暴肆虐的Tiberium荒原.

sentences.en: This and other coastlines will become uninhabitable because of storms from the sea.
sentences.cn: 由于来自海上的风暴,该海岸线和其他的海岸线将变得无法寓居.

trans.tran_en: if a place is uninhabitable, it is impossible to live in
